content: व्यतिरेकः {@--1@} Distinction, difference. {@--2@} Separation from. {@--3@} Exclusion, exception. {@--4@} Excellence, surpassing, excelling. {@--5@} Contrast, dissimilarity. {@--6@} (In logic) Logical discontinuance (<ab>opp.</ab> अन्वय <ab>q. v.</ab>); यत्र साध्याभावस्तत्र हेत्वभाव इति व्यतिरेकव्याप्तिः ({%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} यत्र वह्निर्नास्ति तत्र धूमो नास्ति is an instance of व्यतिरेकव्याप्ति). {@--7@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) A figure of speech which consists in representing the {%Upameya%} as superior to the {%Upamāna%} in some particular respects; उपमानाद्यदन्यस्य व्यतिरेकः स एव सः <ls>K. P. 10.</ls> (व्यतिरेकेण means ‘except, without’; व्यतिरेके ‘on the contrary supposition.’).
